attributes.action: stop the Olympic Games budget rising any further.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This week the Olympic Games budget has risen from around 2 billion to 9billion pounds of taxpayers money. This was due to an inaccurate estimation and 9 billion is now the maximum budget for the Olympic Games 2012.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Olympics/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
